name: Dress up the pony
description:
Fans of horses and riding will be delighted. In this game, they will finally be able to own their own horse. The beautiful woodland walks is for you! But first, you need to clean, you must dry, you must brush, and you must comb your new friend. You can also customize it with multiple accessories. You must take care of him and become his best friend.

Pony Dress Up is a gorgeous game that will test your creativity and your attention to detail. Dress up the pony. You can save up to 9 horses. Your horse must be the best, have fun!

HOW TO PLAY :
Pick in the highlighted objects and drag them on the horse to perform an action. Follow steps one by one, and then you can finish the game with a little make up.

GAME FEATURES :
- Clothes
- Make up
- 9 ponys
- Store
- Several fashion accesories
